name: Mother Superior
aura: Increases Ally SPD in All Battles by 13.

Attacks 1 enemy. 

Has a 35% chance of placing a 25% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns.
skills.name: Lightning Sanction

skills.desc:
Heals an ally by 30% of this Champion’s MAX HP.

Places a [Shield] buff equal to any surplus heal for 2 turns if the target is fully healed by this Skill.
skills.name: Fill With Blessing

Level 4: Heal +10%
Level 5: Heal +10%

skills.desc:
Places a 7.5% [Continuous Heal] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
Places a [Shield] buff equal to 10% of the target’s HP on all allies for 2 turns If an ally’s HP is full.
skills.name: Brim With Life
